00031 #ifndef PROGRESSDOT_H
00032 #define PROGRESSDOT_H
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include <fstream>
00036 #include <iostream>
00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 #include <string>
00039 //
00040 #include "ProgressHandler.h"
00041 
00045 class ProgressDot : public ProgressHandler {
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00058   ProgressDot(int verbosity, std::ostream *out) {
00059     m_Verbosity = verbosity;
00060     m_Out = out;
00061   }
00062 
00075   void progressBegin(int verbosity, const std::string &msg, int total) {
00076     m_Total = total;
00077     // flush any C io before doing our IO
00078     fflush(NULL); 
00079     if(verbosity <= m_Verbosity && m_Out != NULL) {
00080       (*m_Out) << msg;
00081       m_Out->flush();
00082     }
00083   }
00084 
00093   void progressStep(int verbosity) {
00094     if(verbosity <= m_Verbosity && m_Out != NULL) {
00095       m_Out->put('.');
00096       m_Out->flush();
00097     }
00098   }
00099 
00106   void progressEnd(int verbosity, const std::string &msg) {
00107     if(verbosity <= m_Verbosity && m_Out != NULL) {
00108       (*m_Out) << msg << std::endl;
00109       m_Out->flush();
00110     }
00111   }
00112 
00113 private:
00114   std::ostream *m_Out; 
00115   int m_Total;         
00116 };
00117 
00118 #endif /* PROGRESSDOT_H */
